Hello!

The name's Aliff. I'm a fresh graduate in Computer Science (Software Engineering).

I am majoring in software engineering and am experienced in the software development lifecycle from requirement analysis all the way to testing and post-deployment. I have a solid foundation in architecture design, CI/CD processes, and Agile methodologies. I've worked on projects involving JavaScript, PHP, and Python.

I do have some experience in AI, data analytics, data engineering, and robotic programming, including work on real-time facial emotion detection, chatbots using open-source models, programming automated manufacturing machinery, and drafted data warehouse designs.
